login.title: Login - Oregon Employment Department Pandemic Unemployment Assistance
login.message: To continue, log in to the Oregon Employment Department.
login.signUp: Don't have an account? Sign Up

dashboard.alert: Have questions about filing your unemployment insurance claim and potential benefits? Please review our COVID-19 page for information, including frequently asked questions and video tutorials. If you still have questions please send a detailed message to UI Help and we will respond as soon as possible.
dashboard.title: Welcome to your online claim system
dashboard.newClaimDescription: Establish a new claim for Oregon unemployment benefits. If you are filing due to COVID- 19, please watch this training video.
dashboard.weekClaimDescription: Claim a week of unemployment benefits once your claim is established. Just like claiming by phone but easier! * Please see notes below. If you completed your New Claim this week, please wait until Sunday to Claim a Week of Benefits. If you are out of work due to COVID- 19, please read the FAQs prior to claiming a week of benefits.
dashboard.claimStatusDescription: See the status of your current weekly claim report (if claimed by Internet or phone)
